ch.qos.logback.classic.pattern

Class ThrowableProxyConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.qos.logback.core.pattern.Converter<E>
      • ch.qos.logback.core.pattern.FormattingConverter<E>
        • ch.qos.logback.core.pattern.DynamicConverter<ILoggingEvent>
          • ch.qos.logback.classic.pattern.ClassicConverter
            • ch.qos.logback.classic.pattern.ThrowableHandlingConverter
              • ch.qos.logback.classic.pattern.ThrowableProxyConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextAware, LifeCycle
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedThrowableProxyConverter

    public class ThrowableProxyConverter
extends ThrowableHandlingConverter
    Add a stack trace in case the event contains a Throwable.
    Author:
    Ceki Gülcü
